title: Print, "Cahier de Muebles Contenant Six Lits de differente forme et dans le dernier gout", ca. 1789
inscribed:
A Paris chez Mondhare et Jean, rue st. Jean de Beauvais, no. 4.

In upper right margin the number 1 is printed; The number 7 is inscribed in graphite below plate no. 7.
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Cahier de Muebles Contenant Six Lits de differente forme et dans le dernier gout", ca. 1789.
ca. 1789. Sheet: 46.2 x 30.2 cm (18 3/16 x 11 7/8 in.). Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-227-1.
